put.summary: Restore a wallet from your mnemonic

value.mnemonic: vault alarm sad mass witness property virus style good flower rice alpha viable evidence run glare pretty scout evil judge enroll refuse another lava
vault alarm sad mass witness property virus style good flower rice alpha viable evidence run glare pretty scout evil judge enroll refuse another lava

post.description: A new wallet will be created and respond with a mnemonic. Make sure to keep that mnemonic safely as it will allows you to recover your wallet. Default mnemonic size is 24, (options: 12, 15, 18, 21, 24).

example.mnemonic: vault alarm sad mass witness property virus style good flower rice alpha viable evidence run glare pretty scout evil judge enroll refuse another lava

delete.summary: Delete your wallet file (can be recovered with your mnemonic)

get.summary: Reveal your mnemonic. !!! use it with caution !!!

example.mnemonic: vault alarm sad mass witness property virus style good flower rice alpha viable evidence run glare pretty scout evil judge enroll refuse another lava
